eclipse.name: Eclipse
eclipse.description:
<#9ec3e9>"Cast all hope aside. This planet rises against you."</c>

Starts at baseline Monsoon difficulty

eclipse3.name: Eclipse (3)
eclipse3.description:
( 1 )  StageStart, Director Credits: <r>+500%</c>
( 2 )  Teleporter Gains <r>Radius</c>
( 3 )  Enemies Can Spawn <r>After TP Event</c>
